Package controller

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActualLocationController
    This class is the controller for the improved view of the actual location of the current player
    AuctionChoiceController
    This class is the controller of the general view of the auction choice.
    AuctionController
    This class is the controller of the general view of the auction choice.
    AuctionHelpController
    The following class represents the help controller on which you can find auction help.
    BankLoanController
    The controller of the bank loan view
    BuildHelpController
    The following class represents the help controller on which you can find build explanations.
    ChanceHelpController
    The following class represents the help controller on which you can find chance and community chest card explanations.
    ConstructionController
    This class controlls the Construction functionality
    DealNegotiationController
    Controller of the deal negotiation view
    DealPlayerChoiceController
    This class is the controller of the general view of the deal.
    DealPropertyChoiceController
    This class is the controller of the general view of the deal property choice.
    EndOfGameController
    This class is the controller for the view at the end of the game
    EquipementController
    This class controlls the Equipement functionality
    FieldController
    This controller class controls the game part of the program, it links all sub controller classes and manages everything game-wise
    FieldMenuController
    This class is the controller of the action menu
    FreeParkingHelpController
    The following class represents the help controller on which you can find free parking explanations.
    GameChoiceController
    The controller of the game choice view.
    HelpController
    The following class represents the help controller on which you can find several topics related to the game.
    JailHelpController
    The following class represents the help controller on which you can find jail case explanations.
    LittleFieldController
    This class is the controller of the general view of the monopoly board.
    LoanChoiceController
    The controller of the loan view
    LoanPlayerChoiceController
    This class is the controller of the general view of the deal.
    LuxuryTaxeHelpController
    The following class represents the help controller on which you can find luxury taxe explanatory.
    MainController
    Main controller class that links the view of the game and its data
    MenuController
    The controller of the menu view.
    MorgageHelpController
    The following class represents the mortgage-related aid controller.
    MortgagePaneController  
    MortgageTabController
    This class is the controller of the mortgage tab that allows a player during their turn to mortgage their properties in order to earn money.
    PlayerLoanController
    The controller of the player loan view
    PlayersListController
    This class is the controller of the list of players in the current game
    PlayersSelectionController
    This class is used to update the playerSelection view represented by PlayersSelection.fxml file
    PropertiesController  
    PropertyTypeController
    The following class represents the help controller on which you can find the different type of properties
    ReplayController
    This class is the controller of the replay view.
    RoundRuleController
    The following class represents the help controller on which you can find round rule
    SkillsController  
    StationHelpController
    The following table represents the aid controller related to stations and water companies.
    UnmortgageTabController
